INFO.CREATE: Fill in all required fields (marked with *) to create a new user.

INFO.ADMIN_DESC: Reiche Academy Team - Full system access, not linked to any specific company
INFO.MANAGER_DESC: Client company - Manages diagnostics for their own company, can edit their data
INFO.COLLABORATOR_DESC: Client company - Accesses diagnostics for their own company, can edit their data
INFO.READONLY_DESC: Client company - View-only access to their own company's data
INFO.AVATAR_TIP: Optional. Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, WebP (max 5MB). Displayed in navbar and listings.
INFO.PASSWORD_TIP: Minimum 6 characters. In edit mode, leave blank to keep current password.

INFO.CREATE: Fill in all required fields (marked with *) to create a new company.
INFO.EDIT: Edit company information and click 'Update' to save changes.
INFO.DESCRIPTION: Companies represent client organizations registered on the platform. Each company has isolated and personalized system access (multi-tenant), with its own users, data, and visual settings.
INFO.LOGIN_URL_TIP: Defines the custom access URL: /login/{loginUrl}. Use only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens, no spaces.
INFO.LOGO_TIP: Displayed on the company's custom login screen. Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, WebP (max 5MB). Recommended size: 300x115px.
INFO.BUSINESS_TYPE_TIP: Optional. Classifies the company's business segment. You can create new types by typing.
INFO.USERS_DESC: You can associate users with the company in two ways:
INFO.USERS_TIP_1: Create new users directly through the 'Create New User' button
INFO.USERS_TIP_2: Add existing users through the search field
INFO.USERS_TIP_3: Users can be disassociated at any time (Administrator profile)
INFO.MULTI_TENANT_DESC: Each company has complete data isolation. Users from one company cannot view information from other companies.

INFO.CREATE: Fill in the data to create a new pillar. Pillars organize methodology routines.
INFO.EDIT: Edit pillar information. Changes affect all companies using this pillar.
INFO.DESCRIPTION: Pillars are the main categories that structure the Reiche Academy methodology. They group related routines and define the system's visual organization.
INFO.ORDER_TIP: Optional. Defines the display sequence. Leave blank for automatic ordering.
INFO.MODEL_TIP: When active, this pillar appears automatically for all registered companies.
INFO.ACTIVE_TIP: Inactive pillars are hidden but their data remains preserved.
